name: Angel
specialAbilities: Hates devils, +1 morale to creatures in hero's army

name: Archangel
specialAbilities: Hates devils, +1 morale to creatures in hero's army, Can cast resurrection

name: Green Dragon
specialAbilities: Breath attack, Immune to level 1–3 spells, Counts as dragon

name: Gold Dragon
specialAbilities: Breath attack, Immune to level 1–4 spells, Counts as dragon

name: Mage
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, No melee penalty, Hero's combat spells cost 2 less mana, No Obstacle penalty

name: Arch Mage
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, No melee penalty, Hero's combat spells cost 2 less mana, No Obstacle penalty

name: Titan
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, Immunity to mind spells, No melee Penalty, Hates Black Dragons

name: Efreet
specialAbilities: Immune to fire (Magic Arrow included), Hates genies

name: Efreet Sultan
specialAbilities: Immune to fire (Magic Arrow included), Hates genies, Fire Shield

name: Devil
specialAbilities: -1 to enemy luck + no enemy retaliation + Hates angels

name: Arch Devil
specialAbilities: -1 (-2 in Horn of the Abyss ) to enemy luck + no enemy retaliation + Hates angels

name: Vampire Lord
specialAbilities: Undead, No enemy retaliation, Life drain

name: Dread Knight
specialAbilities: Undead, Curses enemies, Death blow attack

name: Bone Dragon
specialAbilities: Undead, Decreases enemy morale by -1, Dragon

name: Ghost Dragon
specialAbilities: Undead, Decreases enemy morale by -1, Dragon, Aging 20%

name: Troglodyte
specialAbilities: Immune to blinding, Immune to petrification

name: Infernal Troglodyte
specialAbilities: Immune to blinding, Immune to petrification

name: Harpy Hag
specialAbilities: Strike and return, No enemy retaliation

name: Medusa
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, No melee penalty, Stone gaze 20%

name: Medusa Queen
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, No melee penalty, Stone gaze 20%

name: Red Dragon
specialAbilities: Dragon, Breath attack, Immune to spells level 1–3

name: Black Dragon
specialAbilities: Dragon, Breath attack, Immune to all spells, Hates Titans

name: Cyclops
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, Can attack siege walls

name: Cyclops King
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, Can attack siege walls

name: Behemoth
specialAbilities: Attack reduces enemy's defense by 40% and 1 point temporarily

name: Ancient Behemoth
specialAbilities: Attack reduces enemy's defense by 80% and 1 point temporarily

name: Hydra
specialAbilities: Attack all adjacent enemies, No enemy retaliation

name: Chaos Hydra
specialAbilities: Attack all adjacent enemies, No enemy retaliation

name: Air Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, Immune to Meteor Shower, Vulnerable to Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Armageddon

name: Storm Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, Immune to Meteor Shower, Vulnerable to Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Armageddon, Spellcaster (Protection from Air), Ranged attack

name: Water Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, Immune to to Ice Bolt and Frost Ring, Vulnerable to Armageddon, Fireball, Inferno

name: Ice Elemental
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, Elemental, Immune to to Ice Bolt and Frost Ring, Vulnerable to Armageddon, Fireball, Inferno

name: Fire Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, Immune to fire (Magic Arrow included), Vulnerable to Ice Bolt and Frost Ring

name: Energy Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, Immune to fire (Magic Arrow included), Vulnerable to Ice Bolt and Frost Ring, Spellcaster (Protection from Fire)

name: Earth Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, Immune to Armageddon - Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning, Vulnerable to Meteor Shower

name: Magma Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, Immune to Armageddon - Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning, Vulnerable to Meteor Shower, Spellcaster (Protection from Earth)

name: Psychic Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, No enemy retaliation, Attacks all adjacent hexes

name: Magic Elemental
specialAbilities: Elemental, No enemy retaliation, Attacks all adjacent hexes, Immune to all magic

name: Firebird
specialAbilities: Immune to fire (Magic Arrow included), (50% fire resistance), Breath attack

name: Phoenix
specialAbilities: Immune to fire (Magic Arrow included), Breath attack, Rebirth

name: Nymph
specialAbilities: Immune to Ice Bolt and Frost Ring

name: Oceanid
specialAbilities: Immune to Ice Bolt and Frost Ring

name: Corsair
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, No melee penalty, No enemy retaliation

name: Sea Dog
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, No melee penalty, No enemy retaliation, Accurate shot. The ability is triggered after a shot: each creature in an attacking stack has a X% chance of killing a creature in the attacked squad, but the total number of killed creatures cannot be more than(number of creatures in an attacking squad) * X / 100(rounded up).X = 3 multiplier for shooting without penalty and X = 2 if shooting with penalty.Ability doesn't work if shooting at creatures behind walls

name: Ayssid
specialAbilities: Ferocity. If at least one creature was killed by the attack, a second blow is inflicted

name: Sea Witch
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, Casts after a shot (Basic level). Casts Weakness for 3 rounds on an attacked stack. If Weakness is already applied, casts Disrupting Ray

name: Sorceress
specialAbilities: Ranged attack, Casts after the shot (Advanced level). Casts Weakness for 3 rounds on an attacked stack. If Weakness is already applied, casts Disrupting Ray

name: Nix
specialAbilities: Ignores 30% of enemy's attack skill (= 30% of the attack parameter is ignored  a creature attacks Nix)

name: Nix Warrior
specialAbilities: Ignores 60% of enemy's attack skill. (= 60% of the attack parameter is ignored when a creature attacks Nix Warrior)

name: Sea Serpent
specialAbilities: Poisonous. Has a 30% chance to poison enemy after the attack.Decrements 10% of Max Health instantly and at the beginning of every round. Lasts for 3 rounds.Cannot exceed 50% of total decremented Health

name: Haspid
specialAbilities: Poisonous. Has a 30% chance to poison enemy after the attack. Decrements 10% of Max Health instantly and at the beginning of every round. Lasts for 3 rounds. Cannot exceed 50% of total decremented Health, Revenge. Has an increase to the Damage parameter before the attack by the following formula: (((number of haspids at the beginning of the battle + 1) * (1 haspid health) / (total health now + 1 haspid health) - 1) ^ 0.5) * 100%
